  16. (* Definition of a few OCaml-specific environment modifiers *)

  18. open Ocamltest_stdlib
  19. open Environments

  21. ‌let wrap sl = " " ^ String.concat " " sl ^ " "
  22. ‌let append var sl = Append (var, wrap sl)
  23. ‌let add var s = Add (var, s)

  25. ‌let principal =
  26. [
  27.   append Ocaml_variables.flags ["-principal"];
  28.   add Ocaml_variables.compiler_directory_suffix ".principal";
  29.   add Ocaml_variables.compiler_reference_suffix ".principal";
  30. ]

  32. ‌let latex =
  33.   [
  34.     add Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_backend "latex";
  35.     append Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_flags ["-latex-type-prefix=TYP"];
  36.     append Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_flags ["-latex-module-prefix="];
  37.     append Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_flags ["-latex-value-prefix="];
  38.     append Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_flags ["-latex-module-type-prefix="];
  39.     append Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_flags ["-latextitle=1,subsection*"];
  40.     append Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_flags ["-latextitle=2,subsubsection*"];
  41.     append Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_flags ["-latextitle=6,subsection*"];
  42.     append Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_flags ["-latextitle=7,subsubsection*"];
  43.   ]


  46. ‌let html =
  47.   [
  48.     add Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_backend "html";
  49.     append Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_flags ["-colorize-code"];
  50.   ]

  52. ‌let man =
  53.   [
  54.     add Ocaml_variables.ocamldoc_backend "man";
  55.   ]

  57. ‌let make_library_modifier library directories =
  58. [
  59.   append Ocaml_variables.directories directories;
  60.   append Ocaml_variables.libraries [library];
  61.   append Ocaml_variables.caml_ld_library_path directories;
  62. ]

  64. ‌let make_module_modifier unit_name directory =
  65. [
  66.   append Ocaml_variables.directories [directory];
  67.   append Ocaml_variables.binary_modules [unit_name];
  68. ]

  70. ‌let compiler_subdir subdir =
  71.   Filename.make_path (Ocamltest_config.ocamlsrcdir :: subdir)

  73. ‌let config =
  74. [
  75.   append Ocaml_variables.directories [compiler_subdir ["utils"]];
  76. ]

  78. ‌let testing = make_library_modifier
  79.   "testing" [compiler_subdir ["testsuite"; "lib"]]

  81. ‌let tool_ocaml_lib = make_module_modifier
  82.   "lib" (compiler_subdir ["testsuite"; "lib"])

  84. ‌let unix = make_library_modifier
  85.   "unix" [compiler_subdir ["otherlibs"; "unix"]]

  87. ‌let dynlink =
  88.   make_library_modifier "dynlink"
  89.     [compiler_subdir ["otherlibs"; "dynlink"];
  90.      compiler_subdir ["otherlibs"; "dynlink"; "native"]]

  92. ‌let str = make_library_modifier
  93.   "str" [compiler_subdir ["otherlibs"; "str"]]

  95. ‌let systhreads =
  96.   unix @
  97.   (make_library_modifier
  98.     "threads" [compiler_subdir ["otherlibs"; "systhreads"]])

  100. ‌let runtime_events =
  101.   make_library_modifier
  102.     "runtime_events" [compiler_subdir ["otherlibs"; "runtime_events"]]

  104. ‌let compilerlibs_subdirs =
  105. [
  106.   "asmcomp";
  107.   "bytecomp";
  108.   "compilerlibs";
  109.   "driver";
  110.   "file_formats";
  111.   "lambda";
  112.   "middle_end";
  113.   "parsing";
  114.   "toplevel";
  115.   "typing";
  116.   "utils";
  117. ]

  119. ‌let add_compiler_subdir subdir =
  120.   append Ocaml_variables.directories [compiler_subdir [subdir]]

  122. ‌let compilerlibs_archive archive =
  123.   append Ocaml_variables.libraries [archive] ::
  124.   List.map add_compiler_subdir compilerlibs_subdirs

  126. ‌let debugger = [add_compiler_subdir "debugger"]

  128. let _ =
  129.   register_modifiers "principal" principal;
  130.   register_modifiers "config" config;
  131.   register_modifiers "testing" testing;
  132.   register_modifiers "unix" unix;
  133.   register_modifiers "dynlink" dynlink;
  134.   register_modifiers "str" str;
  135.   List.iter
  136.     (fun archive -> register_modifiers archive (compilerlibs_archive archive))
  137.     [
  138.       "ocamlcommon";
  139.       "ocamlbytecomp";
  140.       "ocamlmiddleend";
  141.       "ocamloptcomp";
  142.       "ocamltoplevel";
  143.     ];
  144.   register_modifiers "runtime_events" runtime_events;
  145.   register_modifiers "systhreads" systhreads;
  146.   register_modifiers "latex" latex;
  147.   register_modifiers "html" html;
  148.   register_modifiers "man" man;
  149.   register_modifiers "tool-ocaml-lib" tool_ocaml_lib;
  150.   register_modifiers "debugger" debugger;
  151.   ()
